mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure elements are properly aligned and readable on smaller screens to improve mobile user experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and use lazy loading to reduce loading time.
seoOptimizationTip: Implement structured data and improve meta tags for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and ensure clear CTAs (call-to-actions) to enhance user engagement.
bookingFlowTip: Ensure the booking process is streamlined and offers multiple payment methods for convenience.
tips: Consider adding a contact form or email address for customer inquiries.
